se.dat255.bulletinferno.view
Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BackgroundView, EnemyView, HudView, PlayerShipLoadoutView, PlayerShipView, ProjectileView, SegmentView, SliceView, SmokeTrail
public interface Renderable

Interface for objects that are to be rendered by the graphics class.
